name: Norna
description:
He commands - Direct Them to their fates. But will you serve Him? Or Them?


Play as a Demigod

In Norna you are tasked with directing people to their fates. You control where people and objects move, and manipulate their behaviours by directing the way they interact with each other.

Solve It Your Way

There are 120 puzzles for you to solve, made up of 5 different branches - where each branch has its own cast of characters and progression of ideas. With this non-linear structure, if you get stuck on a puzzle, you can switch to a different branch.

Choose Your Fate

Each character you control has an assigned fate above their head. But what about you? Will you do as you're told? Or will you discover the truth about Norna's world?

Official Website

"It's brilliant." - Aaron Sirois [Diehard Gamefan]
